VoiceList.Entry: Cloud “Is it…Sephiroth?”
Cloud “No…not Sephiroth!”
“…After a long sleep…”
“…the time…”
“…time has…come…”
Barret “Look,Cloud!!”
Aeris “Look,Cloud!!”
Tifa “Cloud,look!!”
Red XIII “Over there,Cloud.”
Yuffie “Ov…over there!!”
Cloud “Sephiroth! You're alive!”
“…Who are you?”
Cloud “You don't remember me!? I'm Cloud!”
“Cloud…”
Cloud “Sephiroth! What are you thinking!? What are you doing!?”
“…The time…is now…”
Cloud “What!? What are you saying!? Be more…”
Tifa “I've seen this somewhere…before.”
Aeris “I've seen this before…”
Barret “Isn't he…that guy?”
Red XIII “That's what disappeared from the Shinra building…”
Yuffie “Eeeew! What IS it! GROSS!”
Cloud “…Jenova. The arm of Jenova.”
Barret “Jenova…You mean he's been walkin' around with that thing?”
Aeris “Jenova… With this thing?”
Tifa “Jenova… He's been carrying this thing around?”
Red XIII “Sephiroth took Jenova… What does it mean?”
Yuffie “Gag… I'm sick enough as it is without you having to show me THAT!”
Cloud “So it WAS Sephiroth.”
Tifa “He said something about it being time for something.”
Aeris “The time is now… I think that was what was said.”
Barret “He said the time is now.”
Red XIII “The time is now? What does that mean?”
Yuffie “He was mumbling something about time!”
Cloud “…Time…is now?”
“Dock workers--We will be docking in Costa del Sol in 5 minutes. Prepare for docking.”
Barret “I don't know WHAT the hell's goin' on!”
“Cloud,why don't you explain to me what's happened so far?” I'll try No way
Aeris “Hmm… I don't get it.”
“Hey,Cloud. Can you explain it to us?” I'll try Too much trouble
Tifa “I'm getting so confused…”
“Cloud,explain what's happened so far.” I'll try Too much trouble
Red XIII “Hmm… The story's not that simple.”
“Cloud,why don't you summarize what's happened so far?” I'll try Too much trouble
Yuffie “So what's the story?”
“Hey Cloud. Give us a quick run down.” I'll try Too much trouble
Cloud “…I'll try,but don't interrupt me while I'm explaining.”
Cloud “Sephiroth went off searching for the Promised Land,so he could become the ruler of the Planet… That was 5 years ago.”
Cloud “Then Sephiroth came back and killed President Shinra.”
Cloud “And then just now all of us saw Sephiroth.”
Cloud “He was carrying Jenova with him.”
“…This much I do know. He told me he wants to go to the Promised Land with his mother,Jenova.”
Cloud “…I guess that's about it.”
Cloud “Sephiroth… is alive…”
“The Promised Land… Does it really exist…?”
Barret “Whoa! We'd best hurry and hide somewhere.”
Aeris “Maybe we shouldn't stay in here anymore…”
Tifa “We should hide somewhere again.”
Red XIII “I don't think it's wise to stay here any longer.”
Yuffie “Phew… We're finally here… Now we gotta hide.”
